name: Snakesteroids
description:
Originally a submission for Mini Ludum Dare 67. I've decided to put it up here considering Ludum Dare has changed websites. 

Original submission link:  http://ludumdare.com/compo/minild-67/?action=preview&uid=99192

A mashup of Asteroids and Snake. I borrowed Asteroid controls and border wrap mechanics with Snake game rules. Try to touch the white rings while avoiding your past selves.

Controls: ThrustUp arrow keyTurnLeft and right arrow keys
